T02TD2347E:4a-1: ts'arya do ha g'i ti ka n'a ma /
T02TD2347E:4a-3: spyod pa'i do ha mdzod kyi glu zhes bya ba /
T02TD2347E:4a-4: dpal he ru ka la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD2347E:4a-5: ldong ros kyis ni thig le byas //
T02TD2347E:4a-6: ka tsa ri ni bstan par bya //
T02TD2347E:4a-7: kye ma rtse mos bdud bzhi bcom //
T02TD2347E:4a-8: gzi brjid ldan pa'i rnal 'byor pa //
T02TD2347E:4a-9: smra bar byed pa'i khyab 'jug gam //
T02TD2347E:4a-10: drag po tshangs pa bsrung mi nus //
T02TD2347E:4a-11: kye ma gal te smra ba na //
T02TD2347E:4a-13: ma rungs mkha' 'gro'i tshogs kyis bsrungs //
T02TD2347E:4a-14: kye ma rmongs pa'i mkha' 'gro ma //
T02TD2347E:4a-15: glags tshol bsam pas ci zhig bya //
T02TD2347E:4b-0: khye ho byol song @4b mkha' 'gro ma //
T02TD2347E:4b-1: glags tshol bsam pas ci zhig bya //
T02TD2347E:4b-2: kye ho 'bar ba'i mer ma dug / gzi brjid ldan pa'i rnal 'byor la //
T02TD2347E:4b-3: smra bar byed pa khyab 'jug gam //
T02TD2347E:4b-4: drag po tshangs pa bsrung mi nus //
T02TD2347E:4b-5: ji ltar spu gri ral gri'i so //
T02TD2347E:4b-6: de bzhin la ba pa yi zhabs //
T02TD2347E:4b-7: dam tshig spyod pa ngo mtshar che //
T02TD2347E:4b-8: gzi brjid ldan pa'i rnal 'byor la //
T02TD2347E:4b-9: smra bar byed pa khyab 'jug gam //
T02TD2347E:4b-10: drag po tshangs pa bsrung mi nus //
T02TD2347E:4b-11: spyod pa'i do ha mdzod kyi glu zhes bya ba slob dpon kam ka ba la nas brgyud slob dpon kadka nas gsungs pa rdzogs so//
